Requirements

1. matplotlib
2. numpy
3. pandas
4. scikit-learn
5. scipy
6. pyeda

Python Requirements

1. Python >= 3.11

Project Structure

CTRF
|
|->CTRF
	|
	|-> *All python files*
	|-> Output
	|	  |-> *All pickle files*	
	|-> Training Files
	|	  |-> *All training files csv*

You will have to download the Training and output files from the following line as CSV files are not included while using *pip install CTRF*
